review: i bounced off this game a few times but im very glad i gave it another chance it takes some time to get going but takes advantage of its extremely simple mechanics by making you master and exploit them to perfection with how challenging the missions get   the story and writing also kept me entertained the whole time and was full of classic newgrounds humor surprisingly ended up being one of my favorite games by the behemoth

in los angeles circa 1991 humans live alongside extraterrestrial humanoid beings whose spaceship crash landed three years earlier this coexistence is not always harmonious as exemplified by segregated slums and the uneasy partnership of police detective matthew sykes with new humanoid partner sam francisco however the pair begin to overcome their differences as they play pit people while investigating a slum drug ring led by the slippery william harcourt
